website_summaries.verdict: The Altra Provision 3.0 is a moderately-cushioned running shoe ideal for road and light-trail running. It is designed for runners who need extra support. Many runners applauded the enhanced fit, comfort and breathability of the shoe, but there are also a few who found the shoe to be smaller and less durable. Overall, the Provision 3.0 is still considered by some as a successful update.
pros: Some runners appreciate the new design and overall construction of the Altra Provision 3.0
Most runners found the Provision 3.0 breathable and comfortable
The quick-drying mesh in the upper works efficiently, as noted in some reviews
It has a wide toe-box that promotes natural toe splay
Many runners noticed the enhanced support that the shoe provides
Overpronators liked the redesigned Guide Rail technology that helps reduce excess pronation
The stability is perceptible, in a good way, based on the comments of a handful of runners
According to some testers, this is the first Altra that looks like a “normal” shoe, despite the FootShape toe box
cons: A couple of runners mentioned that the sole of the shoe is not durable
A handful of runners felt like it is a tad smaller than the earlier version of this shoe
A few expert reviewers noted that it required considerable break-in time

customer_reviews.title: Foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I wear fairly neutral to stability style running shoes and heard a lot of good things about this brand but when I got them and tried them on, they were wide but small. I wear a 10 but these seemed short. They are also very stiff and the arch is really overstated. I wore them around the house and my right foot was starting to hurt in the arch. They are very light but though. Not the right shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elahi

customer_reviews.title: Guide rail on 3.0 hurts!
customer_reviews.text: The entire 3.0 altra line is jacked up. Love Altras but just trust me... don’t get sucked in by the low 3.0 prices. The guide rail pushes into your arch. Pain just trying them on. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe For Road Running
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes for running. While it is good for light trail work, Amazon has it misclassified as a true trail shoe. It’s not! It is, however, an amazing road runner. Great arch support and true fit. Good road feedback and support without all the mushy cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Monk

customer_reviews.title: Get with the toe box width
customer_reviews.text: Love the toe box. Love the fit. But the bottom disintegrated after only 50-60 miles...but those were trail miles not road, so probably pretty good if staying on appropriate surfaces
customer_reviews.author: joseph hichborn

customer_reviews.title: Love the toe box
customer_reviews.text: I have almost flat get and so I LOVE the the box in these shoes. Plenty of room for my toes. Happy toes=happy runner.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing arch support - not for the over pronation and stability
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the lack of arch support and stability/motion. Okay for the price. Will not purchase Prefer Brooks for overpronation and quality
customer_reviews.author: Proverb 31

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love the newest model of my favorite Altra shoe. It fits great. Running is very comfortable on my feet in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kimbel

customer_reviews.title: Too small and unconfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me, too small, order a larger size. Trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: F. Segura

customer_reviews.title: 6pm shoes are legit place!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with 6pm shoes prices and the altra shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Thoai

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great Running shoes it Was perfect for me excelent thank you.
customer_reviews.author: josea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look OK but I had to return them because they're too small--the ongoing problem with buying online.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fedman

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit great. However
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great. However, the initial "cushiony" feel of the shoe is different than after the break-in period. It still feels good, just less "cushy."
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't fit like the other Altra shoes I have, glad I didn't pay for cost
customer_reviews.author: Jean Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy toes
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy toes, whitch is what my son needed. Heel a bit tight, but ok after wearing and breaking in for 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I like the fact that they came in a 12.5 size because they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but getting ugly looking yr after yr
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneekers. Look great feel great. Love altra. Especially the provisions 3.0 and paradigm. Its . Just unfortunate the new styles and colors are not too nice. Feel good but not stylish to wear with a pair of jeans. I loved the provision 3.0 blue. And red. Impossible,to find in size 13. Next time I find a pair the. Looks good I'm buying 10 pairs . Come,on,altra. Go back,to the basics and make a nice lookingvsimple one,color shoe. No more rainbows
customer_reviews.author: joe mingoia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe all around. Made for runners with ample toe box for proper splaying. Light and well cushioned too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Altra Men's Provision 3 Road Running Shoe, Blue - 8 D(M) US
product_meta.description: Don't stray from the path, let the Altra Provision 3.0 guide your run and keep you on track. The Altra Provision 3.0 is a dynamic support shoe meaning that support features jump in to guide you only when you need them. The Varus wedge, StabiliPodTM and GuideRailTM technology can help excessive pronators run stronger and longer, as well as provide non-intrusive support for tired feet. Harness your superpower and support your peak performance with the Altra Provision 3.0.
feature_bullets: Find just the right amount of support needed to go the distance, by lacing into the Provision 3 running shoe.

Surface: Road. Differential: 0 mm. Ideal for road running, walking, light trail running, and cross training. Altra® states this shoe is designed to help improve running form and excessive overpronation, as well as assist with fallen arches. Breathable, quick-drying mesh upper with lightweight synthetic overlays. Lace-up closure. FootShape™ toebox allows the toes to relax and splay out for natural comfort, added spring, and stability. Padded tongue and collar. Breathable textile
